Package org.apache.pulsar.client.api.schema

Interface GenericSchema<T extends GenericRecord>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Schema<T>
    @Public
@Stable
public interface GenericSchema<T extends GenericRecord>
extends Schema<T>
    A schema that serializes and deserializes between GenericRecord and bytes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Schema
